opportunities.title: Support for Lisa Bolger's Replacement Search
opportunities.description: Lisa Bolger is planning to transition out of her role by early next year and has requested that AC lead the search for her replacement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Lisa specifically requested that AC lead the search for her replacement because his approach fits their culture.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Assign AC to lead the search for Lisa Bolger's replacement to ensure continuity and cultural fit.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with US Team
opportunities.description: There are challenges with the US team's communication style, indicating an opportunity to strengthen the relationship by improving listening skills.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Need for more listening on US side compared to European side, sometimes tendency to 'over talk' rather than listen.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide training for the US team to enhance their listening skills and better align with PartnerRe's communication preferences.

opportunities.title: Re-engage on Multi-Stakeholder Coordination
opportunities.description: Challenges in coordinating searches with multiple stakeholders across regions suggest a need for re-engagement to improve processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Challenges managing searches with multiple stakeholders across US and Europe, especially when hiring manager is different from engagement lead.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and implement improved processes for managing multi-stakeholder searches to ensure smoother coordination.

opportunities.title: Enhance US Team's Cultural Understanding
opportunities.description: The US team needs a better understanding of PartnerRe's culture to avoid the perception of overselling candidates.
opportunities.supportingQuote: US team may need better understanding of PartnerRe's culture (undersell and over deliver) to avoid overselling perception.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Conduct cultural awareness training for the US team to align their approach with PartnerRe's cultural expectations.

opportunities.title: Improve Timeline and Logistics Management
opportunities.description: There have been delays and coordination issues, particularly with last-minute scheduling requests, indicating a need for better logistics management.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some delays and coordination issues, especially with last-minute scheduling requests.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Enhance logistics management processes to ensure timely coordination and scheduling for multi-stakeholder searches.

opportunities.title: Structured Follow-up with Placed Candidates
opportunities.description: Vanessa expressed a desire for follow-up calls with the placed candidate, Anne, at a few weeks, 3 months, and 6 months to gather candid feedback.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Vanessa hopes for follow-up calls at a few weeks, 3 months, and 6 months to get candid feedback.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured follow-up process with placed candidates at key milestones to ensure successful integration and gather feedback.

opportunities.title: Timely Delivery of Candidate Reports
opportunities.description: Initial candidate reports were sent only 48 hours before interviews, which was too short notice for thorough preparation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Initial candidate reports were sent only 48 hours before interviews (Friday evening for Monday morning interview) - too short notice for thorough preparation.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a standard practice of sending candidate reports 3-4 business days before interviews to allow proper preparation time.

opportunities.title: Fee Structure Flexibility for Non-Exco Positions
opportunities.description: Vanessa mentioned that fees are higher than other headhunters in Belgium, limiting use to Exco level positions only.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Fees are higher than other headhunters in Belgium - limiting use to Exco level positions only.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider offering a more flexible fee structure for non-Exco positions to expand market opportunities in Belgium.

opportunities.title: Ensure Comprehensive Initial Candidate Reports
opportunities.description: Some information was missing from initial reports, though CompanyA was reactive in adding it for subsequent reports.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some information was missing from initial reports, though CompanyA was reactive in adding it for subsequent reports.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure all required information is included in initial candidate reports to avoid back-and-forth and enhance client satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Succession Planning Evaluation Services
opportunities.description: TriSummit Utilities has identified gaps in their succession planning matrix, indicating a need for services that assess capability gaps.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Succession planning gaps - the company's succession matrix had names but no real assessment of capability, creating blind spots that the assessment process revealed.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer comprehensive succession planning evaluation services to help companies assess and address capability gaps.

opportunities.title: Board-Level Coaching and Development
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to provide third-party assistance in board-level coaching, which is important for shareholder validation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Board-level coaching and development - opportunity identified for third-party assistance in board-level coaching, especially given shareholder need for external validation.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Create and market board-level coaching and development services to meet the demand for external validation and support.

opportunities.title: Meeting to Discuss Succession Planning Services
opportunities.description: Greg is planning to meet with ConsultantA to discuss succession planning services, indicating a strong potential for expanded engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg is planning to meet with ConsultantA to discuss succession planning services, showing strong potential for expanded engagement.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Prepare a detailed proposal for succession planning services to present during the upcoming meeting with Greg.

opportunities.title: Enhance Marketing and Brand Visibility
opportunities.description: CompanyA's visibility is limited, with Greg only aware of them through golf sponsorship, suggesting a need for broader marketing efforts.
opportunities.supportingQuote: CompanyA's marketing and visibility - Greg only knew of them through golf sponsorship and wouldn't have heard of them otherwise; suggests need for better marketing/education.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Expand marketing efforts beyond golf sponsorship to include corporate governance education and thought leadership initiatives.

opportunities.title: Develop Educational Content Formats
opportunities.description: There is a need for more accessible educational content, such as one-pagers and conversations, especially for senior executives.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Education and thought leadership - opportunity to provide more educational content (one-pagers, conversations) rather than long papers, especially for older executives.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Create concise educational materials and opportunities for dialogue to engage senior executives more effectively.

opportunities.title: Need for Diverse Consultant Teams
opportunities.description: Jeanette highlighted the importance of having female consultants to attract and identify female candidates, which was lacking in the current engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Diversity in candidate slate - had to repeatedly request women candidates; all consultants were male, making it harder to attract female candidates.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Recruit and deploy more female consultants, especially for roles requiring diverse candidate slates.

opportunities.title: Enhance Compensation Expertise
opportunities.description: There is a need for detailed understanding of compensation structures and better benchmarking capabilities to support senior role negotiations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Compensation information was extremely difficult to obtain - couldn't get current compensation details until offer stage, requiring constant back-and-forth.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Train consultants on compensation structures and develop better benchmarking capabilities to gather compensation information early in the process.

opportunities.title: Follow-up and Relationship Repair
opportunities.description: Jeanette is open to future engagements if improvements are made, indicating a chance to repair and strengthen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Jeanette is open to future engagements if improvements are made.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue outreach efforts and use feedback to improve future engagements, demonstrating commitment to addressing past issues.

opportunities.title: Improve Project Management and Communication
opportunities.description: The process suffered from inefficient communication and late report delivery, impacting preparation and decision-making.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Reports arrived too late - often landing 1-2 hours before calls with 7 new CVs, making preparation impossible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Send reports well in advance of calls (at least 2-3 business days) and proactively manage timelines with clear recommendations.

opportunities.title: Increase Assertiveness and Pace
opportunities.description: The consultants were too hesitant and did not match the high-energy, fast-moving style expected by the client.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Lack of assertiveness - consultants were hesitant, didn't proactively recommend top candidates, required client to drive conversations.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Match high-energy client expectations by proactively recommending top candidates and driving conversations.

opportunities.title: Proactive Brief Alignment
opportunities.description: There was a delay in identifying when candidates did not meet the brief, requiring the client to initiate course correction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Candidates didn't meet brief initially - took 2+ months before right candidates emerged, and CompanyA didn't proactively identify the mismatch.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Regularly check in on brief alignment and proactively identify when candidates don't match requirements, initiating course correction conversations.

opportunities.title: Potential for Broader Consultancy Roles
opportunities.description: The board chair expressed openness to using Korn Ferry for broader consultancy roles beyond executive search.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The board chair is open to using Korn Ferry for broader consultancy roles.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with the board chair to explore specific consultancy needs and propose relevant services.

opportunities.title: Leverage KF4 Assessment Tool
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's KF4 assessment tool was used and appreciated during the CEO search process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry's KF4 assessment tool was used for both candidates and the museum director.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer additional training or workshops on the KF4 tool to further integrate it into the museum's HR processes.

opportunities.title: Maintain Regular Communication Post-Onboarding
opportunities.description: The onboarding of the new CEO is just starting, indicating a critical period for ensuring successful integration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The new CEO's onboarding is just starting.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Schedule regular follow-up meetings to support the CEO's transition and address any emerging needs.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Candidate Quality Assurance
opportunities.description: Greg expressed dissatisfaction with the quality of candidates provided, indicating a need for improved candidate vetting processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Shortlisted candidates were described as 'average' and unsuitable.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a more rigorous candidate screening process to ensure alignment with client expectations.

opportunities.title: Proactive Market Insights and Engagement
opportunities.description: Greg highlighted the value of proactive updates and market insights provided by competitors, suggesting an opportunity to deepen client relationships.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Hunter Healthcare offers strong market knowledge, proactive updates, and value-add connections.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Regularly provide clients with market insights and proactive engagement to demonstrate expertise and commitment.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust and Demonstrate Value
opportunities.description: Greg's decision not to use Korn Ferry again signals a need to re-engage and rebuild trust by demonstrating value.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Client stated clearly they would not use Korn Ferry again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate a follow-up meeting to address concerns and outline steps to enhance service delivery and client satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Clarify Role Expectations and Briefs
opportunities.description: There was a lack of understanding of the matrix COO role, affecting candidate quality, indicating a need for clearer role briefs.
opportunities.supportingQuote: A lack of shared clarity around the matrix COO role undermined candidate quality.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Spend more time clarifying complex roles with clients to ensure mutual understanding and alignment.

opportunities.title: Enhance Compensation and Offer Guidance
opportunities.description: Weak guidance on compensation and unclear offer processes were noted, suggesting a need for improvement in these areas.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Consultant did not demonstrate clarity or ownership in salary and benefits discussions.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide clearer guidance on compensation and offer processes to support confident client decision-making.

opportunities.title: Flexible Client-Centric Communication
opportunities.description: The engagement dynamic felt one-sided, indicating a need for more flexible, client-centric communication.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Engagement often depended on consultant availability rather than client need.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Adapt engagement strategies to be more flexible and responsive to client availability and needs.

opportunities.title: Need for Candidates with Asian Market Experience
opportunities.description: Harry expressed a desire for candidates with more experience in the Asian market, acknowledging the challenge due to the market's youth.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would have liked to see someone with a lot more Asian experience... but I also have to be fair to Korn Ferry — not necessarily a lot of those people exist, right?
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore expanding their candidate pool in the Asian market to better meet future client needs.

opportunities.title: Potential for Broader Consultancy Services
opportunities.description: While Harry currently prioritizes recruitment services due to cost, there is potential to expand into broader consultancy services if cost concerns are addressed.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm a small company...and they are, of course, costly, right?...would they come to me top of the list for an organizational development? No, I don't think I would put them on top of the list.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should consider offering tailored consultancy packages for small companies to make broader services more accessible.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Relationship Through Cost-Effective Solutions
opportunities.description: Harry's cost sensitivity indicates a need to re-engage with solutions that offer high value for money, particularly for small companies.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I can only spend $1 once, and I don't have that many dollars, right? So...I got to be very frugal and make sure that I spend it wisely.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively engage with Harry to discuss cost-effective recruitment solutions that maximize value.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Pool for Asian Market
opportunities.description: Improving the candidate pool with more individuals experienced in the Asian market would better align with Harry's needs.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would have liked to see someone with a lot more Asian experience...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should invest in building a stronger network in the Asian market to enhance their candidate offerings.

opportunities.title: Potential Role of AI in Recruitment
opportunities.description: Tony mentioned that while AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, the current value lies in the human touch. This indicates a potential future need for AI integration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Tony noted that while AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, today the value of Korn Ferry lies in its people-first approach.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore AI solutions that could complement the human-centric approach in recruitment logistics and market reach.

opportunities.title: Enhance Compensation Benchmarking Support
opportunities.description: While compensation benchmarking is handled internally, Korn Ferry could provide additional data points to support Carilion's internal analysis.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If Korn Ferry had that information, it could help inform us as a data point, but it would not be the benchmark we would use in our final analysis.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer to provide comprehensive compensation data to supplement Carilion's internal benchmarking processes.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Trust and Psychological Safety
opportunities.description: The long-term relationship has built trust, enabling honest dialogue, which is crucial for ongoing success.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We've developed a degree of psychological safety and understanding that they can say anything, I can say anything.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to nurture the relationship by maintaining open and honest communication to reinforce trust and psychological safety.

opportunities.title: Position Assessment Tools as Complementary
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's assessment tools are valued but should be positioned as complementary to Carilion's internal tools.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry's leadership assessments are valued but sit alongside Carilion Clinic's existing internal tools.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Emphasize the complementary nature of Korn Ferry's assessment tools in client communications to reinforce their value.

opportunities.title: Sustained Candidate Pipeline

opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure a consistent practice of sustaining candidate pipelines until an offer is fully secured.

opportunities.title: Rehire Potential with Communication Improvements

opportunities.supportingQuote: I would say that in general, it was a positive experience. If we had search to do over again, I would rehire them, as long as we did some early setting of communication preferences, timeliness of responses, that sort of thing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Set clear communication expectations upfront, including SLAs, channels, and cadence to ensure alignment.

opportunities.title: Proactive Assessment Notifications
opportunities.description: Andre highlighted the need for more proactive notifications when assessment results are issued to avoid delays.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There hadn't been a communication from the team beyond sending it to a dedicated mailbox... that sort of proactive nudge that says, Hey... This is where things are standing. That was missing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Embed proactive assessment notifications as a standard practice to provide alerts when outputs are sent.

opportunities.title: Communication Style and Cadence
opportunities.description: Initial communication misalignment highlighted the need to agree on preferred communication style and cadence.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We are a time sensitive organization... Sometimes it would be overnight, sometimes it would be a little bit longer.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Agree on communication style and cadence upfront to ensure responsiveness aligns with client expectations.

opportunities.title: Association-Specific Expertise Development
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry should develop a deeper understanding of the unique operational and governance models of associations to better serve clients like WSPA.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The consultant struggled to fully grasp the unique operational and governance model of associations.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Invest in training or hire consultants with specific expertise in association governance and operations.

opportunities.title: Leverage Prior Association Successes
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's previous successful engagements in the association sector can be used to build stronger relationships and trust with similar clients.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We chose Korn Ferry because they had worked with associations before...[and] because they had done the API President search.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Highlight past successes in association roles during pitches to similar organizations to reinforce credibility.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust with Governance Adherence
opportunities.description: Adhering to agreed governance structures and decision-making processes is crucial to rebuilding trust with WSPA.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The consultant sometimes went directly to the Board Chair, overriding the recruitment policy.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure all consultants are briefed on and adhere to the client's governance structures and decision-making processes.

opportunities.title: Enhance Responsiveness to Client Feedback
opportunities.description: Improving the speed and accuracy of responses to client feedback can strengthen relationships and trust.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Feedback sometimes required repeating before being actioned, particularly around narrowing candidate numbers.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a feedback tracking system to ensure client inputs are promptly addressed and acknowledged.

opportunities.title: Align Candidate Selection with Client Criteria
opportunities.description: Ensuring candidate recommendations align with client criteria and compensation expectations is critical to maintaining confidence.
opportunities.supportingQuote: External candidates were put forward despite clear feedback they were not appropriate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Conduct thorough reviews of client criteria and compensation ranges before presenting candidates.

opportunities.title: Proactive Assessment Discussions
opportunities.description: Michael emphasized the need for early discussions about assessment processes to avoid overlap with Cargill's internal assessments.
opportunities.supportingQuote: My only recommendation is make sure you have a very clear conversation with your client about your assessment, whether they have one, and whether it makes sense to do both. Yeah, upfront.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate a conversation with clients early in the process to align on assessment strategies and avoid duplication.

opportunities.title: Deepen Thought Partnership
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's expert guidance was highly valued, suggesting an opportunity to further deepen the advisory role in recruitment processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were [a] really good thought partner on process, like who the candidate should interview with.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer additional strategic advisory services to enhance the partnership and provide more value to clients.

opportunities.title: Maintain Pipeline Confidence
opportunities.description: There was concern about the search being too dependent on a single finalist, which was resolved by introducing additional candidates.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was some stress at one point that, like, man, are we putting all our eggs in one basket... at the 11th hour, Korn Ferry pulled a rabbit out of their hat with the candidate that ultimately got this job.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure a robust candidate pipeline is maintained throughout the search process to provide clients with multiple strong options.

opportunities.title: Clarify Assessment Expectations
opportunities.description: Clarifying assessment expectations early can prevent friction and ensure alignment with client processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: My only recommendation is make sure you have a very clear conversation with your client about your assessment, whether they have one, and whether it makes sense to do both.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a standard protocol for discussing assessment processes with clients at the start of each engagement.

opportunities.title: Need for Quicker Interim Updates

opportunities.supportingQuote: It would have been better to just get...the first profile to work with...and tell them [yes] that's going in the right direction.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a system for providing early draft profiles or search signals to clients to ensure they feel engaged and informed throughout the process.

opportunities.title: Potential for Future Engagement

opportunities.supportingQuote: Yes, absolutely [would use them again]...I'm really happy with the result.

opportunities.title: Address Initial Perception of Disengagement

opportunities.title: Enhance Flexibility in Processes
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina felt that Korn Ferry's structured methodology was sometimes too rigid compared to boutique firms.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sometimes I would have liked them to be a bit more...flexible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce more flexibility in the process to adapt to client needs, while maintaining quality standards.

opportunities.title: Improve Response Times
opportunities.description: Emails sometimes went unanswered for extended periods, which affected the perception of responsiveness.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sometimes it took 30 hours or so but you have an email to three [people] so you would have thought at least one of them could just tell me, look, we are going to answer maybe tomorrow, but [we got nothing].
opportunities.suggestedAction: Set clear response time expectations and ensure that all team members are aware of and adhere to these standards.

opportunities.title: Adopt Modern Data Handling Practices
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina preferred a more secure method for sharing profiles, such as a shared drive, over email.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'd rather you share your drive, you can put them there, and once the search is finished, I'm going to close the drive then I'm perfectly fine with all the data security.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Transition to using secure, client-preferred methods for data sharing to enhance client experience and data security.

opportunities.title: Advisory on AI Impact on Workforce
opportunities.description: Stephen expressed interest in understanding AI's impact on workforce development and compensation structures, indicating a potential need for advisory services in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: AI awareness is something always on my mind… it’s confusing, but it’s changing how younger generations develop within the workforce.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore offering advisory services on AI's impact on workforce development and compensation strategies.

opportunities.title: Broader Engagement as DLH Grows
opportunities.description: Stephen mentioned the possibility of using Korn Ferry more broadly as DLH Holdings expands, indicating an opportunity to deepen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would consider using them more broadly as DLH Holdings grows.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively discuss potential areas for expanded engagement as DLH Holdings scales.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Partnership Through Quality Assurance
opportunities.description: Occasional errors in presentation materials have slightly undermined confidence, suggesting a need to reinforce the partnership through improved quality control.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I always trust their work. But...there are times where I have found mistakes...which I'm kind of surprised about.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement additional quality control measures to ensure accuracy in deliverables and maintain client confidence.

opportunities.title: Enhance Quality Control in Deliverables
opportunities.description: Stephen noted occasional errors in materials, indicating a need for improved quality assurance processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Occasional calculation/formula errors in presentations slightly undermined confidence.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Strengthen internal quality control processes to prevent errors in client deliverables.

opportunities.title: Post-Placement Follow-Up

opportunities.supportingQuote: I really hope that they will do a follow up with [our placement]...when she's [been] here for a few weeks and then maybe within three or six months....Give her a call and really ask like how is it going and then give me the feedback because that's really valuable for me
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured post-placement follow-up process to gather feedback from both clients and candidates.

opportunities.title: Timely Delivery of Candidate Reports
opportunities.description: The initial candidate report was delivered too close to the interview, limiting preparation time.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They sent the first candidate report...48 hours before the interview...I told them that this was too short

opportunities.title: Consistency in Report Content
opportunities.description: An early report lacked specific details required for the interview, which was quickly corrected.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was also some information missing... but they were very reactive and adapted it for the next reports.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Premium Positioning for Senior Roles
opportunities.description: Vanessa views Korn Ferry as a premium partner for top-tier searches, justifying fees for ExCo and general management roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: For ExCo positions, yes. For other positions, no, because actually their fees are higher than all the other headhunters in Belgium.

opportunities.title: Need for Broader Expertise and Data
opportunities.description: Lisa expressed interest in leveraging Korn Ferry's broader expertise and data resources for various needs, indicating a future requirement for these services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm like I actually need something in this area, have you got something that would help, while it's not everyday...there's been a sharing of all the resources that are available to us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively offer insights and data resources that could benefit PartnerRe in areas beyond executive search.

opportunities.title: Deepening Partnership Through Flexibility
opportunities.description: Lisa appreciates the flexibility in engagement design and pricing, suggesting an opportunity to deepen the partnership by continuing this approach.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There's always some nuance...and that flexibility and that ability to really think about how we can meet the partnering needs has very much been appreciated.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to offer flexible engagement models and pricing structures to strengthen the partnership with PartnerRe.

opportunities.title: Enhancing Listening and Coordination
opportunities.description: There is a need to improve listening balance and coordination, especially in multi-region engagements, to strengthen the partnership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There's probably a little bit more listening needed on the US side than the European side... there's just that opportunity really, really just listen...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement training and processes to enhance listening and coordination skills across teams, focusing on multi-region engagements.

opportunities.title: Streamlining Scheduling Processes
opportunities.description: Minor scheduling issues were noted, indicating a need to improve the scheduling process to avoid last-minute conflicts.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I know there's been some [difficulty] trying to get meetings in the diary with CFF, or interviews in the diary with the CFF last minute, which is never going to work for her.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear scheduling protocols and advance planning to prevent last-minute meeting conflicts.

opportunities.title: Provide Compensation Benchmarking Reports
opportunities.description: Cana expressed interest in receiving periodic compensation benchmarking surveys, similar to those provided by other firms in the past.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If we could get more comp benchmarking surveys. I know that when we used to work... with Heidrick & Struggles, they would send us an annual comp report which was helpful.

opportunities.title: Support Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Initiatives
opportunities.description: Macquarie Group is focusing on increasing diverse representation in senior hiring, presenting an opportunity for Korn Ferry to assist in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: increasing diverse representation in senior hiring.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose tailored search strategies and candidate pipelines that emphasize diversity and inclusion to support Macquarie's DE&I goals.

opportunities.title: Enhance Digital and AI Integration
opportunities.description: Macquarie is expanding its technological capabilities and data-led decision-making, which Korn Ferry can support through advanced search technologies.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Digital and AI integration: expanding technological capability and data-led decision-making across the business.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce Korn Ferry's digital tools and AI-driven insights to assist Macquarie in enhancing their recruitment processes.

opportunities.title: Ensure Consistency Across Consultant Teams
opportunities.description: There have been inconsistencies in delivery quality across different project teams, which could affect client satisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I wasn't as impressed...we had a talent search...the person that was on it was fine but then he ended up leaving so wasn't as engaged...Jerry took over and we were able to move the process along pretty quickly...it depends on the team that you're working with.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a standardized process for consultant engagement and delivery to ensure consistent quality across all teams.

opportunities.title: Maintain High Standards of Engagement
opportunities.description: While the overall relationship is positive, maintaining the high standards of engagement and delivery is crucial for continued success.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Maintain high standards of engagement and delivery. Continue the strong preparation, responsiveness, and persistence that differentiate Korn Ferry across searches.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Regularly review and reinforce best practices in client engagement and delivery to sustain high service standards.

opportunities.title: Enhance Market Data Configurability
opportunities.description: Felix noted a significant gap in the ability to filter market data by bonus-paying versus non-bonus-paying companies, which is crucial for accurate benchmarking.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I miss... very specific aspects... I cannot say I don't want to see only companies who pay a bonus... sometimes I'm not happy with this kind of data submission.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce clearer filters in the market data to differentiate between bonus-paying and non-bonus-paying companies.

opportunities.title: Provide Affordable Grading Tool
opportunities.description: Felix had to create their own grading tool due to dissatisfaction with the available options, indicating a need for a practical and cost-effective solution.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've also created a grading tool by ourselves, because they don't provide one which is very useful or not too expensive.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore offering a practical and affordable grading tool to meet client needs.

opportunities.title: Address Functional vs Hierarchical Leadership
opportunities.description: Felix found it difficult to benchmark roles with functional versus hierarchical leadership within the current methodology.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Many people have functional leadership roles in comparison with hierarchical... can be difficult.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide guidance or examples on how to handle functional versus hierarchical roles within the methodology.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship Through Continued Responsiveness
opportunities.description: The strong rapport and trust with the Korn Ferry team were highly valued, suggesting an opportunity to deepen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: With the colleagues of the team... I get very well... they are very responsive, and I don't have feelings that... you cannot trust them.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain and enhance the strong responsiveness and relationship-building efforts with Metro.

opportunities.title: Onboarding Support for New CEO
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry has promised to support the onboarding of the new CEO, but this phase has not yet begun.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They have promised us that they will be there... but it hasn't really begun yet.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate the onboarding support process promptly to ensure a smooth transition for the new CEO.

opportunities.title: Single Point of Contact for Communication
opportunities.description: Early confusion was caused by communications from multiple Korn Ferry staff, making it difficult to track information.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Early on, it was a little confusing... several different people... reaching out... we couldn't search for [emails] easily.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a single, consistent communication point from the start of the project to streamline information flow.

opportunities.title: Leverage Institutional Knowledge for Future Projects
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's familiarity with the museum has strengthened the partnership, indicating potential for future collaboration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They had helped us with salary surveys... market analyses... job description... we'd been working with them on and off for two or three years.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore additional projects where Korn Ferry's institutional knowledge can be leveraged to add value.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Gender-Diverse Sourcing
opportunities.description: Jeanette expressed a need for more gender-diverse candidate slates in future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We had to remind the guys a number of times that we want to see women as well as men.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement transparent, proactive processes to ensure balanced slates and review team composition to enhance diverse sourcing perspectives.

opportunities.title: Improve Compensation Discovery Process
opportunities.description: The current process for obtaining compensation details is slow and lacks depth, impacting offer decisions.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Trying to get out of them what current comp was, was impossible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Gather full, detailed compensation information early in the process to reduce back-and-forth with candidates and prevent delays at the offer stage.

opportunities.title: Increase Assertiveness and Leadership
opportunities.description: Jeanette felt the consultants lacked assertiveness and leadership, requiring her to drive the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It always felt very hesitant.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively highlight recommended candidates, lead discussions confidently, and guide decision-making to take ownership of meeting facilitation.

opportunities.title: Enhance Pace and Preparation
opportunities.description: Reports and materials were often shared too late, limiting preparation and slowing the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The reports would often land an hour or two before the call.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Share reports and candidate materials with sufficient lead time for stakeholders to review and maintain momentum from the outset.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust with Jeanette
opportunities.description: Jeanette's experience was inconsistent with her previous positive impressions of Korn Ferry, leading to doubts about future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm not sure we'll go back there again, because that was really hard work at the end.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with Jeanette to address her concerns directly and demonstrate improvements in the areas she highlighted.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Succession Planning Services
opportunities.description: Greg Aarssen expressed interest in involving Korn Ferry in improving succession planning and reducing blind spots within the organization.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think we need to have someone that is doing some of these... evaluations and analysis to make sure that we don't have blind spots.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with Greg Aarssen to discuss and develop a tailored succession planning service that addresses the identified blind spots.

opportunities.title: Broader Board-Level Support
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to expand the relationship by offering board-level support and more rigorous succession assessment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg sees clear scope for more rigorous succession assessment and board-level support, and is already exploring this with Korn Ferry.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose a comprehensive board-level support package that includes succession assessment and strategic advisory services.

opportunities.title: Re-engage for Future Executive Searches
opportunities.description: Greg expressed a strong intent to reuse Korn Ferry for future executive searches, indicating a need to maintain engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Would I ever use these people again? I can't imagine not using them again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular communication with Greg Aarssen to ensure Korn Ferry remains top-of-mind for future executive search needs.

opportunities.title: Increase Visibility in the Market
opportunities.description: Greg suggested that Korn Ferry could potentially strengthen its visibility, indicating an area for improvement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: He struggled to identify any issues with the work itself, suggesting only that Korn Ferry could potentially strengthen its visibility.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a marketing strategy to enhance Korn Ferry's visibility and presence in the executive search market.

opportunities.title: Need for concise assessment reports
opportunities.description: The CEO expressed a desire for more concise and clearly framed summaries in assessment reports, particularly regarding candidates' ability to handle conflict and restructuring.
opportunities.supportingQuote: You might sometimes maybe have wished them to be a little bit more black and white... on the very concrete things, how things will work.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a format for executive summaries that highlights key behavioural aspects in a clear and concise manner.

opportunities.title: Enhance parking facilities for client visits
opportunities.description: The CEO mentioned a minor irritation with the lack of parking spaces at Korn Ferry's office, which could affect the overall client experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'd wish they had parking spaces in their own office, because you always have to go to another building... it's a bit annoying.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore options to improve parking facilities or provide clear guidance on alternative parking arrangements for client visits.

opportunities.title: Leverage strong relationships for future engagements
opportunities.description: The CEO's trust in specific individuals and existing relationships was a key factor in selecting Korn Ferry, indicating potential for future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I knew the boss, I knew the consultant that I wanted to work with, because I have a deep trust in [Danny]'s... human touch.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to nurture and leverage strong individual relationships and local leadership to secure future engagements.

opportunities.title: Maintain communication and transparency
opportunities.description: The CEO appreciated the fast and transparent communication throughout the process, which contributed to a positive experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: No, I never felt like, Hey, I don't know what's going on.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure continuous and transparent communication in all engagements to maintain client satisfaction and trust.

opportunities.title: Reintroduce Dual-Consultant Model
opportunities.description: The dual-consultant model was a unique differentiator that added value through diverse perspectives. Its removal has reduced the perceived quality of consultation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: That was the differentiating factor... two different individuals from two different cultures.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore the feasibility of reinstating the dual-consultant model selectively in high-value markets or key accounts.

opportunities.title: Clarify Value of Assessment Tools
opportunities.description: Assessment tools were provided but not used as they did not support Jan's decision-making process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got that for free in some instances, but honestly, I didn't use it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide clearer guidance on when and how assessment tools can meaningfully inform hiring decisions.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Consultation Quality
opportunities.description: The removal of the dual-consultant model has led to a perceived reduction in consultation quality.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got different quality of the consultations because obviously the second person was adding a certain perspective and value.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider ways to enhance consultation quality, possibly by incorporating diverse perspectives even within a single-consultant model.

opportunities.title: Separate Positioning for Broader Consulting Services
opportunities.description: Jan does not assume Korn Ferry's search capabilities translate to transformation or development work, indicating a need for distinct positioning.
opportunities.supportingQuote: No, because that's a different skill set... I would again pitch and see who's best.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure broader consulting services are introduced by the right experts and positioned separately from search capabilities.

opportunities.title: Broader Candidate Sourcing
opportunities.description: Gary expressed a need for Korn Ferry to explore a wider range of candidate profiles, including those from outside traditional sectors, for high-profile roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I had urged them to look broad... like college presidents... and they didn't really do that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should develop strategies to identify and engage candidates from diverse and non-traditional backgrounds for executive roles.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Readiness Checks
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to improve the vetting process for candidate readiness, particularly regarding relocation and commitment, to prevent late-stage withdrawals.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry should have vetted this ahead of time... before we went through this final testing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement more rigorous early-stage checks on candidate readiness and commitment to avoid disruptions in the final stages of the search process.

opportunities.title: Maintain Continuity and Ownership
opportunities.description: Gary noted a drop in engagement and prioritization after the lead partner's absence, indicating a need for consistent leadership throughout the engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It just felt a little bit... an ownership thing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure continuity by assigning a secondary lead or maintaining regular updates to clients when key team members are temporarily unavailable.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Late-Stage Execution
opportunities.description: Gary felt that the search lost direction towards the end, suggesting a need for stronger late-stage execution and proactive management.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It got off to such a good start... and then it sort of skidded off the runway.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a framework for maintaining momentum and focus during the final stages of the search process to ensure a smooth and effective conclusion.

opportunities.title: Need for Enhanced Partnership Dynamics
opportunities.description: Julie expressed a need for more collaborative and respectful engagement, particularly in recognizing her role and authority.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It definitely feels like a diminishment of my role.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should ensure consistent recognition of Julie's role and foster a more collaborative partnership.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Collaborative Fee Handling
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to strengthen the relationship by adopting a more partnership-oriented approach to fee discussions.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Being treated like that makes me not want to work with them again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should apply discretion in fee-related discussions to align with long-term partnership expectations.

opportunities.title: Re-engage with Improved Communication
opportunities.description: Julie felt sidelined and disrespected, indicating a need to re-engage with better communication and respect for her role.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They're managing up... in a way that felt somewhat disrespectful to me and my role.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should prioritize re-engaging with Julie by improving communication and respecting her role in the partnership.

opportunities.title: Reduce Operational Burden on Client
opportunities.description: Julie noted an over-reliance on her team for logistics, suggesting a need to clarify and rebalance operational responsibilities.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They rely on us very heavily for everything logistical...It feels like they kind of expect us to do their logistics.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should align expectations around logistics and coordination to ensure a balanced operational effort.

opportunities.title: Enhance Process Efficiency with Better Resource Management
opportunities.description: Repeated requests for previously shared materials indicate inefficiencies that could be improved by better resource management.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were like, 'Oh, we don't have that template. Can you send it again?'
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should strengthen continuity in process management by ensuring materials and templates are retained and reused.

opportunities.title: Need for Broader Consulting Support
opportunities.description: Tim mentioned that broader consulting support may be needed in the future as the organization scales.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think we'd need a bit more scale before we went to somebody of Korn Ferry size to do other work like that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Monitor Logistics UK's growth and proactively offer consulting services as they scale.

opportunities.title: Leverage Psychometric Tools for Development
opportunities.description: Tim plans to use psychometric assessment tools for development planning beyond hiring.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We use their psychometric tools for assessment, and they were very, very good. It will be used for a development plan, yeah, absolutely.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer tailored development programs using psychometric assessments to enhance leadership capabilities.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Relationship with Regular Check-ins
opportunities.description: Tim appreciated the structured communication and accessibility during the search process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We had one scheduled weekly call throughout the process... and they were always available for other queries, more ad hoc stuff.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular communication and accessibility to reinforce the strong relationship with Logistics UK.

opportunities.title: Enhance Outward-Facing Leadership Capability
opportunities.description: Tim highlighted the importance of high-quality outward-facing leadership following the CEO appointment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The most important thing for us is that our outward facing activities are done by really high-quality people.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Focus on recruiting and developing leaders with strong outward-facing skills to meet this growing priority.

opportunities.title: Support for Upcoming Organizational Transformation
opportunities.description: Claire anticipates a broader organizational transformation at ASML in the coming year, which may require additional support from Korn Ferry.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It will be a culture change… but we all don’t know what it is.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively engage with Claire to discuss potential support Korn Ferry can offer during the upcoming transformation.

opportunities.title: Iterative Program Design for Enhanced Cohorts
opportunities.description: The ability to refine the program cohort by cohort is seen as a differentiator, suggesting an opportunity to expand this iterative design approach.
opportunities.supportingQuote: After every cohort, we can tweak a little bit to make every cohort a better program.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to leverage and promote the iterative design approach to enhance future cohorts and explore additional areas for refinement.

opportunities.title: Increase Awareness of Broader Capabilities
opportunities.description: Alexander expressed limited awareness of Korn Ferry's broader offerings beyond executive search, indicating a potential need for more information on additional services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm not aware of what other products or services they offer.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a strategy to increase awareness of Korn Ferry's full range of services among existing clients like Alexander.

opportunities.title: Leverage Pay Benchmarking and Market Insight
opportunities.description: Alexander values Korn Ferry's compensation insights, which support internal decision-making and budget alignment, suggesting an opportunity to expand this service.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're asking Korn Ferry for market data on pay... It's helpful for us...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer expanded compensation benchmarking services to deepen the relationship with clients who find this data valuable.

opportunities.title: Promote Use of Assessment Tools
opportunities.description: Although Korn Ferry's assessment tools were not used in recent searches, this was due to hiring leader preference rather than dissatisfaction, indicating a chance to re-engage clients with these tools.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They're not necessarily looking at any assessment tools... They like to just have a conversation with the particular candidate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Reintroduce and demonstrate the value of assessment tools to hiring leaders to encourage their use in future engagements.

opportunities.title: Enhance Visibility of Broader Capabilities
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to improve client awareness of Korn Ferry's broader capabilities, which could lead to increased utilization of these services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Opportunity to increase awareness of broader capabilities.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a communication plan to regularly update clients on the full range of services offered by Korn Ferry.

opportunities.title: Need for Early Collaborative Re-alignment
opportunities.description: When a new internal lead steps in mid-stream, there is value in consciously rebuilding the relationship and re-contracting ways of working.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We could have gone aside a bit more together as colleagues. We could have shaped it a bit better, a bit earlier between us, just a little bit more collaborative.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured process for re-alignment when client-side stakeholders change mid-engagement.

opportunities.title: Continued Willingness to Work with Korn Ferry
opportunities.description: Despite challenges, Luke indicated a willingness to work with Korn Ferry again, with careful consideration of context.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would, I would do. I would be very specific about circumstance and everything and all of that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage Luke in discussions about future projects, ensuring clarity on circumstances and expectations.

opportunities.title: Create Space for a 'Reset' Conversation
opportunities.description: A 'reset' conversation when client-side ownership changes can help establish working preferences and decision dynamics.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Recognize that there's been a cut and that the new person is different, or that, you know, you've got a blank slate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce a formal 'reset' meeting when new stakeholders inherit an engagement to quickly build rapport and collaboration.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Early Calibration on Scope
opportunities.description: Building in deliberate early checkpoints can confirm whether the search has sufficient breadth to sustain momentum over time.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There had been a decision to be very precise about the type of person that the business wanted to appoint, and I think that made it more challenging.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish early calibration meetings to ensure the search scope is broad enough to maintain momentum.

opportunities.title: Maintain Confidence Signals During Difficult Phases
opportunities.description: Pay attention to how frustration or fatigue might be experienced by the client and reinforce shared direction and progress.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It was obvious to see that there was a bit of frustration. I could tell that it was getting challenging and tiring.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement regular check-ins to reinforce progress and shared goals during challenging phases of a search.

opportunities.title: Broaden Korn Ferry's Service Offerings
opportunities.description: Lesley expressed an increased openness to considering Korn Ferry for future work, particularly in more commercial aspects beyond the initial HR model work.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've now got a greater appreciation of the breadth that Korn Ferry can bring to us... particularly the much more commercial aspects of it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore and propose additional services that align with the client's broader commercial needs.

opportunities.title: Develop Strategic Partnership
opportunities.description: Lesley values long-term strategic partnerships over multiple relationships, indicating an opportunity to deepen the relationship with Korn Ferry.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I do look for what I’ll call strategic partners… because organisations cannot manage multiple relationships.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Position Korn Ferry as a strategic partner by demonstrating ongoing commitment and value in key areas of interest to the client.

opportunities.title: Ensure Consultant Role in Implementation
opportunities.description: Lesley desires consultants to remain engaged through implementation to ensure successful outcomes, highlighting a need for re-engagement during this phase.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I do think it's really important that consultants see that their role is to ensure successful implementation, rather than just recommendation.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a clear role for consultants in the implementation phase to maintain engagement and ensure project success.

opportunities.title: Proactive Escalation of Internal Misalignment
opportunities.description: Lesley would have appreciated more proactive escalation when internal alignment or momentum began to slip, suggesting an area for improvement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Escalate the minute you feel that... there's not enough alignment internally.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a process for early identification and escalation of alignment issues to ensure timely intervention.

opportunities.title: Clarify Consultant Role in Implementation
opportunities.description: There is a need for clearer framing of the consultant's role during the implementation phase to ensure intent is preserved.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Reinforcing the distinction between adapting communication style and diluting core recommendations may help preserve intent in complex environments.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Clearly define and communicate the consultant's role and responsibilities during the implementation phase to all stakeholders.

opportunities.title: Address Market Constraints in Engineering Disciplines
opportunities.description: Karina highlighted a decline in candidate availability in certain engineering disciplines, such as electrical engineering, due to market conditions.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're seeing a decline in availability in certain engineering disciplines like electrical engineering... and we see that across the board.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore strategies to expand candidate sourcing in scarce engineering disciplines to meet future hiring needs.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Regular Updates
opportunities.description: Karina appreciated the structured communication and regular updates provided by Korn Ferry, which helped maintain alignment and confidence.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg scheduled by monthly calls with the team... to give us updates, to share... additional context on the candidates... and help answer any questions.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue and potentially increase the frequency of structured updates to further deepen the relationship and ensure alignment.

opportunities.title: Maintain Feedback-Driven Adjustments
opportunities.description: Karina valued the team's responsiveness to feedback and the ability to adjust search parameters quickly.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg and his team were... always asking for kind of timely feedback, and so there was nothing that was lagging that wasn't immediately addressed.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure continuous engagement with ExxonMobil by maintaining a proactive feedback loop to adjust search strategies as needed.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Interest Validation
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's early screening of candidate interest and fit was appreciated, but ongoing reinforcement of this practice is recommended.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were already... testing interest and availability up front.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Enhance the process of validating candidate interest and location fit to ensure alignment with ExxonMobil's needs.
